text: int main ( ) { int t , n , arr [ 6000 ] , i , j , a , index , crr_max , next_max ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; i = 1 , j = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ 0 ] ) ; crr_max = arr [ 0 ] ; next_max = arr [ 0 ] ; while ( i < n ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( j == 0 ) { next_max = arr [ 0 ] ; if ( arr [ 1 ] > arr [ 0 ] ) { next_max = arr [ 1 ] ; } scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; arr [ 0 ] += a ; } else if ( j == i ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; arr [ j ] = a + next_max ; } else { scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; crr_max = next_max ; next_max = arr [ j ] ; if ( arr [ j + 1 ] > arr [ j ] ) next_max = arr [ j + 1 ] ; arr [ j ] = crr_max + a ; } } i ++ ; } i = 0 ; while ( i < n ) { printf ( "%d  " , arr [ i ] ) ; i ++ ; } t -- ; } return 0 ; }
